name: clichecafe
description: Portfolio project for Nucamp called Cliche Cafe

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.imagemin: imagemin images/* -o dist/images && imagemin images/food/* -o dist/images/food
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin menus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/menus.html && usemin reserve.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/reserve.html &&

author: Joumana Laude
